MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool IsControlElementCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this is understood by the end user as interactive or the user might understand the element as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)]. This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement%2A>.
Docs.returns: If this is associated with a element, this method returns ; otherwise, this method returns a list of child elements.

Docs.summary: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.
Docs.value: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.

Docs.summary: Gets a UI Automation provider that implements and represents the container of the cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.

Docs.summary: Gets the ordinal number of the row that contains the cell or item.
